meanings.sent1: The project required collaboration interclass students.
meanings.sent2: The students from different grades worked interclass on the assignment.
meanings.sent3: The teacher accidentally placed the math book interclass the history books.
meanings.sent4: The friendship between the two groups was like a bridge interclass the classes.
meanings.sent5: The interclass competition brought together students from various grades.

meanings.definition: Relating to or involving different classes.
meanings.sent1: The interclass debate showcased diverse opinions.
meanings.sent2: The school organized an interclass event for all students.
meanings.sent3: The interclass party had students from different grades dancing together.
meanings.sent4: Her interclass friendships enriched her high school experience.
meanings.sent5: The interclass interactions promoted unity among students.

meanings.definition: A member of a class that is between two other classes.
meanings.sent1: She was an interclass in the advanced math group.
meanings.sent2: The interclass student served as a bridge between the two groups.
meanings.sent3: The interclass was excited to participate in both clubs.
meanings.sent4: Being an interclass, he understood the perspectives of both groups.
meanings.sent5: The interclass brought a unique perspective to the discussion.
